Hardened masters of occult power, urdefhan blood mages trade their blood for magical might. A heavily scarred blood mage is held in esteem by their fellow urdefhans, as it shows they have survived many bargains with eerie occult patrons. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 24 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19 [Urdefhan Blood Mage](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1390) **Source** [Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=81) pg. 85 **Perception** +15; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Daemonic](/Languages.aspx?ID=31), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +16, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +16, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +18, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +16 **Str** +4 **Dex** +2 **Con** +4 **Int** +6 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +2 **Items** _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56)_ --- **AC** 26 **Fort** +18 **Ref** +14 **Will** +17 **HP** 140 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) **Necrotic Decay** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118)) When an urdefhan dies, its invisible flesh quickly rots away and sublimates into a foul-smelling gas that fills a 5-foot emanation around the body. This gas deals 8d6 negative damage to creatures in this area as their flesh curdles and rots as well (DC 24 [basic Fortitude save](/Rules.aspx?ID=329)). --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** kukri +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 2d6+8 piercing **Melee** jaws +15, **Damage** 2d6+8 plus Wicked Bite **Divine Innate Spells** DC 26, attack +18 - **1st** [Feather Fall](/Spells.aspx?ID=111) (at will; self only), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) - **2nd** [Death Knell](/Spells.aspx?ID=63) - **3rd** [Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213) **Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 26, attack +18 - **Cantrips (8th)** [Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) - **1st** [Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141), [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220) (4 slots) - **2nd** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Ghoulish Cravings](/Spells.aspx?ID=134), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Touch of Idiocy](/Spells.aspx?ID=341) (4 slots) - **3rd** [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Levitate](/Spells.aspx?ID=170), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) (4 slots) - **4th** [Call the Blood](/Spells.aspx?ID=845), [Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Phantasmal Killer](/Spells.aspx?ID=219) (4 slots) **Blood Offering** ([Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Metamagic](/Traits.aspx?ID=107), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The blood mage cuts themself and takes 8 slashing damage. If the blood mage's next action is to [Cast a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=72), the action can't be disrupted, and if the spell has a range, the blood mage can increase that spell's range by 30 feet. **Wicked Bite** **Requirements** The urdefhan damaged a creature with a jaws Strike on its last action; **Effect** The urdefhan maintains contact, turning the creature's flesh translucent around the site of the injury. The urdefhan chooses one of two options, each of which requires a DC 26 Fortitude save. If the jaws Strike was a critical hit, the creature suffers both effects, using the same save result for both.
  • **Drain Blood** The urdefhan drinks some of the creature's blood. On a failed save, the creature is [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) and the urdefhan regains 10 HP (or, on a critical failure, it's drained 2 and the urdefhan regains 20 HP).
  • **Drain Vitality** ([necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) The urdefhan draws out some of the creature's vital essence. The creature becomes [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) for 1 hour on a failed save (or enfeebled 2 for 1 hour on a critical failure).
Blood Magic Urdefhans typically cast divine spells, as their cultural connection to the [Four Horsemen](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=11) is strong. Those who embrace blood magic are turning away from their cult's zealous faith for strange occult powers.
name: Urdefhan Blood Mage
